decision_conditions:
Reason : 1 - This proposal CONSTITUTES DEVELOPMENT within the meaning of Section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 and a planning application IS REQUIRED.  

By reason of the inclusion of a fully equipped bathroom in the outbuilding, the proposal falls outside the scope of Class E as it cannot be considered as being a building incidental to the enjoyment of the dwellinghouse.
Reason : 2 - This proposal CONSTITUTES DEVELOPMENT within the meaning of Section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 and a planning application IS REQUIRED.  

The proposed outbuilding given its combined scale, absence of justification to demonstrate why it was not possible to accommodate some of the activities in the enlarged dwelling and lack of satisfactory demonstration that the outbuilding is reasonably required for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the main dwellinghouse fails to demonstrate compliance with Schedule 2, Part 1, Class E of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015, as amended.
Reason : 3 - INFORMATIVE
Note to Applicant
In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton  (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:
"	Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
"	Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
"	As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.
In this instance:
"	The application was not considered to comply with the provisions of the Development Plan and NPPF as submitted, and would have required substantial changes such that a new application would be required. 
"	The application was considered to be fundamentally contrary to the provisions of the Development Plan and the NPPF, and there were not considered to be any solutions to resolve this conflict. 
"	It is noted that the applicant/agent did not engage in any pre-application discussions.
"	The applicant is advised to seek pre-application advice on any resubmission.
description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED DEMOLITION OF EXISTING OUTBUILDING AND RAISED PLATFORM, AND ERECTION OF A PROPOSED SINGLE STOREY OUTBUILDING IN THE REAR GARDEN FOR USE INCIDENTAL TO THE ENJOYMENT OF THE DWELLINGHOUSE
